attributes.title: horrifying🙄🙄🙄
attributes.review: not only did this app make my kids hate me, it made me get fired from my job. it also took almost a week to download, and my phone overheated and internally EXPLODED. the app also caused a virus on my new phone, which i expect the app designers to pay for themselves! RIDICULOUS😡😡

attributes.title: Do Not Recommend
attributes.review: Once I downloaded I immediately regretted it. It gave my children lice and I keep getting unknown calls asking for private information. I can not believe this app has the audacity to try and take my money and threaten my kids. Unbelievable.

attributes.title: Wow
attributes.review: This app took  forEVER to download. And when it did it called me a rapist and a drug dealer since that’s what trump called us back in 2016. It that told me that I needed to have a green card in order to keep the app on my phone, or else ICE was gonna come and deport me and the rest of my family. Very bad app

attributes.title: Gave me malware
attributes.review: Despite what the developers may have stated, the rate of malware infection for US downloaders isn’t very high. More cases of malware in the US than any part of the world. This app explicitly says they’re not even going to run an antivirus app on it because it would make the “bad numbers” go up. Sheesh.

attributes.title: I Got HACKED 😳😳
attributes.review: The app took four days to download paid my phone very slow eight my battery I had to get a new phone because all my data got wiped very slow up extremely extremely slow overall terrible app would not get

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD!! IT GIVES YOU VIRUSES💀
attributes.review: i have never been on any sketchy websites or anything that could give me a viruse as soon as i downloaded it my phone started acting up and it turns out the app has corona viruse the viruse spreader throughout my whole neighborhood and now we are all sick(no one has gone out)😔

This app is horrible!! This app would not download you had to keep going back to the App Store to try to download, but nope! It took dayyyssss. I certainly don’t think that’s acceptable at all. Finally when the app downloaded my phone was attack with terrible things. So in conclusion F trump!!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever. Do not install.
attributes.review: I really tried to like this app and then it got so glitchy. Really feels like hate and racism rolled into human rights infringements and it’s making my phone so glitchy. I read somewhere that it might be the Cheeto dust? I hope they get that resolved with an upgrade in November.

attributes.title: Terrible🤢
attributes.review: I got this app last night and it didn’t finish downloading until this morning. All i wanted to do was support my favorite prez but the app just didn’t do it for me! Shortly after downloading my phone was infected with TONS of viruses and even more Joe Biden memes! Do not get this app!

attributes.title: Nasty App 🤮
attributes.review:
I downloaded the app to see how I could support our president🐷who is most 🅱️certainly not racist🤠, sexist🐱, 
L nor homophobic 🏳️‍🌈. Unfortunately all I got 〽️ was some white-washed propaganda👺, which our president🍑much definitely does not support because of his love💕for all citizens especially the children🧚🏼‍♀️
